full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I SGRUB THABS DANG, SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010B (ZHES DANG RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I SGRUB THABS DANG, SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA 'DI NI CHOS RJE AER TE NI PAndI TA MKHAN PO DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO NAS BSKUL BA LTAR` ^PAndI TA CHEN PO AABHYA: K'A RAS MDZAD PA'I SBYIN SREG 'OD KYI SNYE MA DANG, MKHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I LEGS BSHAD CHEN PO DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO SOGS KYI DGONGS PA DANG MTHUN PA, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
